hopobject.name: OMAP U-Boot Utils
hopobject.body:
Traditionally U-Boot has worked with terminal applications such as minicom/hyperterminal/ckermit etc. However, * These applications dont work out fine when we think of automating these as part of scripts or the like. * Many corporations use a mixture of Operating Systems at work. Common applications functioning similarly accross host Operating Systems are sadly lacking.
With the bunch of utilities in this project, we hope to bridge these gaps. We can create wrappers on top of these utilities, allowing us to potentially have scripted interfaces or even GUI, or IDE integration! Sites: * Source Code hosting: Git Hub http://github.com/nmenon/omap-u-boot-utils/ * Binaries and Documentation: code.google.com - http://code.google.com/p/omap-u-boot-utils/
hopobject.shortdesc: U-Boot Utilities for Texas Instrument's OMAP platforms
